panels.content:
----
## Aqüicultura Digital Oberta
----
Es mostren les alertes de temperatura del dispositiu.

options.content:
----
## Aqüicultura Digital Oberta
----
Shows the configured alerts for the devices

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "messages" WHERE ("name" = 'Temperature') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.params_js:
{
 from:ctrl.range.from.format('x'),  // x is unix ms timestamp
 to:ctrl.range.to.format('x'), 
 height:ctrl.height,
 now:Date.now(),
 interval: ctrl.template('$__interval'),
 sample: 'Not escaped: $__interval',
 since:ctrl.lastRequestTime
}
panels.title: Set Alarm Limits
